questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A van
D) Art and culture

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A parked vehicle
B) A moving vehicle
C) A vehicle accident
D) A vehicle being repaired

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person walking
B) A building
C) A tree
D) A vintage van

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A bicycle
B) A vintage van
C) A tree
D) A bus stop

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A beach
B) A busy street
C) Trees and a house
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A person
B) A bicycle
C) A vintage van
D) A street sign

What color is the vehicle in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Green
D) Orange

What brand is the vehicle in the photo?
A) Ford
B) Volkswagen
C) Toyota
D) Honda

What type of vehicle is shown in the photo?
A) A sedan
B) A truck

D) A motorcycle

What is the condition of the vehicle?
A) New
B) Old and rusty
C) Well-maintained vintage
D) Damaged

A) A surfboard
B) A roof rack
C) A bicycle

A) A beach
B) A tree
C) A house
D) A shopping mall

A) Curtains

C) Luggage
D) Animals

A) Blue
B) Red

D) Green

What is the make of the vehicle?
A) Chevrolet

C) Ford
D) Nissan

What is the model of the vehicle?
A) Van

D) Passat

C) Snow
D) Water

What is the state of the trees in the background?
A) Leafy and green
B) Bare branches
C) Covered in snow
D) Flowering

A) Paved and clean

A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Green

C) Scratched and dented

A) Modern

A) Black
B) Silver
C) Gold
D) White

A) Blue
B) White
